meanings.definition: Excessive sensitivity or susceptibility to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: Her oversensitiveness to loud noises made it difficult for her to concentrate.
meanings.sent2: His oversensitiveness to criticism often led to misunderstandings with his friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat's oversensitiveness to the vacuum cleaner was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The oversensitiveness of the alarm system made it impossible for even a mouse to sneak in undetected.
meanings.sent5: The oversensitiveness of her skin to sunlight required her to always wear sunscreen.

meanings.definition: The state of being easily offended or hurt.
meanings.sent1: His oversensitiveness to jokes made it challenging to have a lighthearted conversation with him.
meanings.sent2: She often felt overwhelmed by her oversensitiveness to others' opinions.
meanings.sent3: The oversensitiveness of the flower to the slightest touch was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The oversensitiveness of the politician to criticism was compared to a fragile glass sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The oversensitiveness of his emotions made him a target for bullies at school.
